dct_title_s: Paradise or the garden of Eden
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "English Miles".
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of 2 compass roses, a sea monster, and ship.
